Module applications
Package applications.database_console_application

Class DBUtils

java.lang.Object
applications.database_console_application.DBUtils
public class DBUtils extends Object
Utility class for handling database operations related to metro stations and their ridership hours. Works with MySQL database server.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    DBUtils.Search
    Enum representing different search options for querying Operating Hours data.
    static enum 
    DBUtils.Sort
    Enum representing different sorting options of Metro Stations or Operating Hours data for querying metro stations.

    • getHoursByMetroStationID

      public static List<HourForDB> getHoursByMetroStationID(long metroStationID)
      Creates the HourForDB list, which stores all the data about Hours with certain MetroStationID from the database.
      Returns:
      the HourForDB list where the data about Hours is stored.

    • findHoursWithWordInComment

      public static List<HourForDB> findHoursWithWordInComment(String word)
      Displays data on the console about all Operating Hours with a certain word or word fragment in the comments.
      Parameters:
      word - word of word fragment to search for.
      Returns:
      a list of hours retrieved from the database.

    • findHours

      public static List<HourForDB> findHours(DBUtils.Search searching)
      Finds the Hours records according to a specified DBUtils.Search search rule.
      Parameters:
      searching - the DBUtils.Search rule for searching data;
      Returns:
      a list of hours retrieved from the database.

    • findHours

      public static List<HourForDB> findHours(DBUtils.Search searching, String metroStationName)
      Finds the Hours records according to a specified DBUtils.Search search rule for a specified Metro Station.
      Parameters:
      searching - the DBUtils.Search rule for searching data;
      metroStationName - the name of the Metro Station;
      Returns:
      a list of hours retrieved from the database.

    • getTotalRidership

      public static int getTotalRidership()
      Gets the total ridership for all Operating Hours in the database.
      Returns:
      a total ridership for all Hours retrieved from the database.

    • getTotalRidership

      public static int getTotalRidership(String metroStationName)
      Gets the total ridership for Operating Hours of a specified Metro Station in the database.
      Parameters:
      metroStationName - the name of the Metro Station;
      Returns:
      a total ridership for Hours of a specified Metro Station retrieved from the database.

    • metroStationToString

      Creates a string representation of the data about Metro Station on the console.
      Parameters:
      metroStation - the MetroStationForDB object to print.

      metroStation - the MetroStationForDB object to print.

      Parameters:
      hours - list of HourForDB to print.

    • hoursWithMSIDToString

    • showMetroStations

      public static void showMetroStations()
      Displays all the Metro Stations data from database.

    • showMetroStationsWithHours

      public static void showMetroStationsWithHours()
      Displays all the Metro Stations data with theirs Operating Hours from database.

    • showMetroStationsWithHoursByName

      public static void showMetroStationsWithHoursByName(String metroStationName)
      Displays all the Metro Stations data with theirs Operating Hours from database for a specified Metro Station.
      Parameters:
      metroStationName - the name of MetroStation to search.

    • showMetroStationsSortedByAscName

      public static void showMetroStationsSortedByAscName()
      Displays the Metro Stations data from database sorted by ascending name.

    • showMetroStationsSortedByDescName

      public static void showMetroStationsSortedByDescName()
      Displays the Metro Stations data from database sorted by descending name.

    • showMetroStationsSortedByAscOpened

      public static void showMetroStationsSortedByAscOpened()

    • showMetroStationsSortedByDescOpened

      public static void showMetroStationsSortedByDescOpened()
      Displays the Metro Stations data from database sorted by descending opened year.
